nodes.text: The Ghtroc 440 Light Freighter was an older model light freighter produced by Ghtroc Industries. It was operated by a crew of two plus two gunners.

The Class 440 freighter first appeared in Planets of the Galaxy, Volume One in form of the freighter Isilia. However, the ship's class was not revealed until the release of the Planets Collection Sourcebook, which compiled and extended several entries of the three Planets of the Galaxy books.
All statistics are for the Isilia, a modified variant.
